fields.name: title
fields.label: Internal reference
fields.description: For internal reference only

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.description: This text will appear in the first line when this shows up in search results. Max 60 characters

fields.label: Description
fields.name: description
fields.description: This text will appear as the description when this shows up in search results. Max 160 characters will show. Note, sometimes Google may choose to not use this text if it doesn't think it is accurate enough.

fields.label: Image
fields.name: image
fields.description: This image will show up when this page is shared on social media. It should be at least 1200px wide and 630px tall.

fields.label: Index
fields.name: index
fields.description: Allow search engines to index this page.

fields.label: Follow
fields.name: follow
fields.description: Allow search engines to follow the links on this page.

defaultItem.defaultDescription: This is a Homework Club creation

fields.label: URL
fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL of your site. This will be used to generate the canonical URL for your pages.

fields.label: Site Name
fields.name: siteName
fields.description: The name of your site. This will be appended to the title of your pages.

fields.label: Default description
fields.name: defaultDescription
fields.description: A default description for your site. This will be used as the description when a page does not have its own description.

fields.label: Title divider
fields.name: divider
fields.description: A character or string that will be used to separate the title of your pages from the site name. For example: ' | '

fields.label: Default image
fields.name: defaultImage
fields.description: This image will show up when this page is shared on social media. It should be at least 1200px wide and 630px tall.

fields.label: Discourage search engines from indexing this site
fields.name: noIndex
fields.description: If checked, search engines will be discouraged from indexing this site.

fields.name: contactLinks
fields.label: Contact Links
fields.description: Links to your social media profiles and more

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
